definitions.definition: The part of the mind that is aware of itself; the consciousness.
Alert, awake; with one's mental faculties active.
definitions.example: The noise woke me, but it was another few minutes before I was fully conscious.

definitions.definition: Aware of one's own existence; aware of one's own awareness.
definitions.example: Only highly intelligent beings can be fully conscious.

definitions.definition: Aware of, sensitive to; observing and noticing, or being strongly interested in or concerned about.
definitions.example: I was conscious of a noise behind me.   a very class-conscious analysis

definitions.definition: Deliberate, intentional, done with awareness of what one is doing.
Known or felt personally, internally by a person.
